applesoft.case.caseSensitive.description: Lower case in reserved words or variables is considered an error.

applesoft.warn.terminalString.description: Warn against missing unquotes. In Applesoft, strings without an unquote run to end-of-line.

applesoft.warn.collisions.description: Warn against long variable name collisions. In Applesoft, variables of the same type with the same first two characters share the same storage, i.e., are the same.

applesoft.case.lowerCaseCompletions.markdownDescription: Use lower case in completions and snippets (ingored if `#applesoft.caseSensitive#`).

applesoft.hovers.specialAddresses.markdownDescription: Show hovers for special addresses such as ROM routines, soft switches, etc.

applesoft.hovers.keywords.markdownDescription: Show hovers for keywords such as `PRINT`, `FOR`, etc..

applesoft.vii.newMachine.markdownDescription: Type of machine to use when spawning a new Virtual ][ machine

applesoft.vii.speed.markdownDescription: Emulator speed to set before running code in Virtual ][

applesoft.vii.color.markdownDescription: Use color monitor when spawning a new Virtual ][ machine

applesoft.warn.run.markdownDescription: Warn before writing to an emulator or emulator state file

scripts.reset-client:windows: npx rimraf client\out && mkdir client\out && copy server\src\*.wasm client\out && copy client\src\*.scpt client\out
scripts.reset-client:default: npx rimraf client/out && mkdir client/out && cp server/src/*.wasm client/out && cp client/src/*.scpt client/out
scripts.reset-server:windows: npx rimraf server\out && mkdir server\out && copy server\src\*.wasm server\out
scripts.reset-server:default: npx rimraf server/out && mkdir server/out && cp server/src/*.wasm server/out
scripts.vscode:prepublish: npm run esbuild-client -- --minify && npm run esbuild-server -- --minify
scripts.build: npm run esbuild-client -- --sourcemap && npm run esbuild-server -- --sourcemap
scripts.test-compile: npm run reset-client && tsc -p ./client/ && npm run reset-server && tsc -p ./server/
